outputs.output_descr: The main objectives of this project are to assist the Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation, the Department of Statistics, and their social sector partners to develop the definitions, the measurement and information tools, the analytical and technical capacity, and the coordination mechanisms that will be needed to respond to the challenges of the next decade created by the rising "social risks" of vulnerability and exclusion that are likely to confront the Kingdom. Phase II initiatives are designed to provide direct support to the National Agenda 2006  2015 poverty alleviation initiatives 2, 3, 4 and 6 as follows: 2. Develop a comprehensive national social policy with a focus on social development and productivity enhancement; 3. Strengthen human resource capacities to implement poverty alleviation programs; 4. Develop a clear understanding of poverty root causes and characteristics; 6. Provide assistance to the unemployed poor to integrate into the workforce.

project_descr:
Support to Poverty Analysis and Monitoring at Ministry of Planning and Department of Statistics: 
Thinking Differently about Poverty and the Poor
project_title: Support to Poverty Analysis and Monitoring
